name: SpaceFighter Revolt
description:
Created for BenBonk Game Jam #3.  Created solo in Unreal Engine over 72 hours.  The theme used was Two Sides.

SpaceFighter Revolt is a top-down arcade style schmup game.  You pilot a ship with the ability to avoid damage by changing colors via the Shift ability.  When you hit an enemy laser or ship of the same color, you won't take damage.  Enemy ships will spawn of either Blue or Orange color, use your Shift ability to avoid taking damage and take out as many of them as you can.

STORY

In the future, two sides war against each other for control of outer space.  You are an ace space fighter pilot on a suicide mission with the goal of infiltrating and stealing an enemy prototype ship named The Shifter.  Use your new ship to take out as much of enemy as possible and give your side a fighting chance in the war.    

CONTROLS / GAMEPLAY

The goal is to survive as long as possible, taking out as many of the enemy ships are you can.  The more enemies you take out, the higher your score.  Compete against yourself and others to get the highest score.

CONTROL FUNCTION DESCRIPTION WASD / ArrowsMoveMove your ship up/down, left/rightLeft-Click (Hold)Shoot Fire lasers
Right-Click or ShiftChange ColorToggle your color between Blue and Orange
